title: IDA : trap call
content:
i'd like to improve support for Atari ST in IDA. To do this, I'd like to know if there is a way to handle trap #1 (gemDos), trap #2 (gem), trap #13 (bios) and trap #14 (xbios) used this way 
MOVE.W #3, (-SP)
TRAP #13 ; call Bconout (bios func 3)
Is it possible to auto detect the function number put on the stak before a trap call ? and so add the right comment ? I know some plugins do it on request only (ex: press CTRL+SHIFT+T to launch the detect), it'll be a valid option if automatic detection isn't possible/accurate. thanks for any hint !
